instructions: Go to Settings > Sounds & Haptics (on supported models ) or Sounds (on other iPhone models). To set the volume for all sounds, drag the slider below Ringers and Alerts. To set the tones and vibration patterns for sounds, tap a sound type, such as ringtone or text tone. Do any of the following: Choose a tone (scroll to see them all). Ringtones play for incoming calls, clock alarms, and the clock timer; text tones are used for text messages, new voicemail, and other alerts. Tap Vibration, then choose a vibration pattern, or tap Create New Vibration to create your own.
